page.title: 13WEST THURROCK PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The present West Thurrock Primary School,built in 1975,is on the site of the original school that was opened on July 4th.1879. It is an "open plan"building providing education for children from the age of four years to eleven years.The four year old children are housed in a purpose built nursery class. The classes are vertically grouped,which means that children from two year groups operate in the same class,with teachers in "teams"of two working in open plan areas.there are 195 children on roll. The school building plays an important part in the community.As well as the school,the site includes a youth centre,an old people's complex and the nursery.
